T16TD4394E:324b-0: @324b ` // dpal legs par grub par byed pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i smon lam bzhugs /
T16TD4394E:324b-2: # // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T16TD4394E:324b-3: 'jig rten dag gi phyogs kun na //
T16TD4394E:324b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa gang bzhugs dang //
T16TD4394E:324b-5: dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' dag / de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T16TD4394E:324b-6: tshe rabs gang yang rung ba ni //
T16TD4394E:324b-7: bdag gis sdig pa ci bgyis dang //
T16TD4394E:324b-8: sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan dag dang //
T16TD4394E:324b-10: 'dod chags dbang dang blun pa dang //
T16TD4394E:324b-11: khro ba dag gis 'khrugs gyur te //
T16TD4394E:324b-12: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun nam //
T16TD4394E:325a-2: dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T16TD4394E:325a-3: sbyin gnas gang yang rung ba dang //
T16TD4394E:325a-4: de las gzhan pa'i sems can dag / yon tan ldan dang mi ldan la //
T16TD4394E:325a-5: sdig pa'i las rnams gang bgyid dang //
T16TD4394E:325a-6: gang yang bgyid du stsal ba dang //
T16TD4394E:325a-7: gang yang cung zad yi rang ba //
T16TD4394E:325a-8: bag med pas ni phra mo yang //
T16TD4394E:325a-9: lus ngag yid kyis bgyis pa rnams //
T16TD4394E:325a-10: de dag ma lus blos bsdus nas //
T16TD4394E:325a-11: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sras bcas pa //
T16TD4394E:325a-12: bdag gi de ni mngon sum bzhin //
T16TD4394E:325a-13: rab tu gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T16TD4394E:325a-14: skyo ba'i yid du gyur pa yis //
T16TD4394E:325a-15: thal mo sbyar te nongs pa rnams //
T16TD4394E:325a-16: yang dang yang du so sor bshags //
T16TD4394E:325a-17: bdag gis mi dge bgyis pa rnams //
T16TD4394E:325a-18: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen pa bzhin //
T16TD4394E:325a-19: de ltar bdag gis so sor bshags //
T16TD4394E:325a-20: slan chad de ltar yongs mi bgyi //
T16TD4394E:325a-21: srog chags sdug bsngal zhi ba'i phyir //
T16TD4394E:325a-22: bdag nyid ji srid 'tsho'i bar du //
T16TD4394E:325a-23: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
T16TD4394E:325a-24: gus pas yang dag skyabs su mchi //
T16TD4394E:325a-25: de yi yon tan gus bsgrags te //
T16TD4394E:325a-26: sa la mgo bos gtugs nas ni //
T16TD4394E:325a-27: dkon mchog gsum la blo can gyis //
T16TD4394E:325a-28: de ltar gus pas skyabs su 'gro //
T16TD4394E:325a-29: de nas mchog gi sa bon gang //
T16TD4394E:325a-30: thar pa bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu sbyin //
T16TD4394E:325a-31: shin tu bsgoms nas mchog gyur pa //
T16TD4394E:325a-32: dngos grub phyir ni de bskyed do //
T16TD4394E:325a-33: sems can khams ni mtha' yas pa'i //
T16TD4394E:325a-34: sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba dang //
T16TD4394E:325a-35: ngan 'gro rnams las bsgral ba dang //
T16TD4394E:325a-36: nyon mongs rnams las sgrol ba'i phyir //
T16TD4394E:325a-37: srid pa mi bde dog pa na //
T16TD4394E:325a-38: sdug bsngal sna tshogs ci mchis pa //
T16TD4394E:325a-39: de dag yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir //
T16TD4394E:325a-40: bdag gis byang chub sems bskyed do //
T16TD4394E:325a-41: sems can phongs pa thams cad kyi //
T16TD4394E:325a-42: skyabs su bdag nyid rtag tu shog / bdag ni mgon med rnams kyi mgon //
T16TD4394E:325a-43: rten med rnams kyi rten du bdag / skyabs med rnams kyi skyabs 'gyur zhing //
T16TD4394E:325a-44: sdug bsngal bde bar byed pa dang //
T16TD4394E:325a-45: bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi //
T16TD4394E:325a-46: nyon mongs zhi bar byed par shog / dge ba'i las rnams gang dang gang //
T16TD4394E:325b-0: 'di @325b dang gzhan du bsags pa rnams //
T16TD4394E:325b-1: bsod nams ye shes zhes bya ba'i //
T16TD4394E:325b-2: tshogs ni rnam pa gnyis su shog / pha rol phyin pa drug sgo nas //
T16TD4394E:325b-3: bdag gi brtson 'grus gang brtsams pa //
T16TD4394E:325b-4: de yang sems can ma lus pa //
T16TD4394E:325b-5: thams cad la ni phan par shog / tshe yi mtha' klas byed pa dang //
T16TD4394E:325b-6: gang yang cung zad byed 'gyur ba //
T16TD4394E:325b-7: mdor na sems can thams cad kyi //
T16TD4394E:325b-8: nyon mongs thams cad zhi ba dang //
T16TD4394E:325b-9: grol bar bya ba'i phyir 'bad cing //
T16TD4394E:325b-10: byang chub rab tu dga' brtson no //
T16TD4394E:325b-11: de nas rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems //
T16TD4394E:325b-12: cho ga bzhin du kun tu skyed //
T16TD4394E:325b-13: sems can kun la snying rje dang //
T16TD4394E:325b-14: byams pa nye bar gnas par bya //
T16TD4394E:325b-15: sems ni legs par sbyang ba'i phyir //
T16TD4394E:325b-16: sna tshos thabs kyis rjes dran drug / nang gi bdag nyid zhi ba yis //
T16TD4394E:325b-17: bsam pa gcig tu bsgom par bya //
T16TD4394E:325b-18: sngon gyi rgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis //
T16TD4394E:325b-19: smon lam ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin //
T16TD4394E:325b-20: bdag kyang dge ba'i sems kyis su //
T16TD4394E:325b-21: de bzhin du ni smon lam 'debs //
T16TD4394E:325b-22: chos kyi longs spyod sna tshogs la //
T16TD4394E:325b-23: mnyam par gzhag nas yi rang ngo //
T16TD4394E:325b-24: sems can thams cad bde ba dang //
T16TD4394E:325b-25: zhi zhing nad kyang med par shog /
T16TD4394E:325b-26: bdag kyang bya ba kun nus shing //
T16TD4394E:325b-27: yon tan dang yang ldan par shog / nor ldan gtong phod shes rab can //
T16TD4394E:325b-28: bzod ldan dge la dad pa yis //
T16TD4394E:325b-29: sems ldan tshe rabs thams cad du //
T16TD4394E:325b-30: skye ba dran zhing brtser ldan shog / dpal legs par grub par byed pa'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i smon lam rdzogs so//
